title: MTGGoldfish

Upload schedule for Major Series:

Monday: Budget Magic, MTGGoldfish Podcast

Friday: Much Abrew About Nothing
Saturday: Arena Series with Crim

videos.author: MTGGoldfish
videos.title: The Most Exhausting Gruul Deck Ever  Much Abrew
videos.description:
Is Afterburner Expert actually just Standard-legal Vengevine? Let's give Gruul Exhaust a try and find out!

Today's video is brought to you by Card Kingdom. You can pick up some Magic: the Gathering cards (and help support the show) at https://www.cardkingdom.com/mtggoldfish

► Read more about this deck (full article): https://www.mtggoldfish.com/articles/much-abrew-is-vengevine-back-in-standard
► View this deck with the latest prices: https://www.mtggoldfish.com/deck/6929490#paper

◼ Purchase this deck (paper): http://mtg.fish/PtU63
◼ Purchase this deck (Magic Online): http://mtg.fish/9tKC3
